trans-unit.source: Provides the base functionality for writing resources to an output file or stream.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller grundläggande funktioner för skrivning resurser till en utdatafil eller dataström.

trans-unit.source: Resource writers are used to write resources to files in a particular file format.
trans-unit.target: Resurs-skrivare för att skriva resurser till filer i ett visst filformat.

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface if you want to control the way in which a resource file is written (for example, to store resources in something other than a .txt, .resx, or binary .resources file).
trans-unit.target: Implementera gränssnittet om du vill styra hur som en resursfil skrivs (till exempel för att lagra resurser i något .txt-, resx-eller binär .resources-fil).

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use the default <xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter> class, which writes resources to a binary .resources file, or the <xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceWriter> class, which writes resources to an XML resource (.resx) file.
trans-unit.target: Annars använder standard <xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>-klassen, som skriver resurser till en binär .resources-fil, eller <xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceWriter>-klassen, som skriver resurser till en XML-resursfil (resx).</xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceWriter> </xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>

trans-unit.source: Adds an 8-bit unsigned integer array as a named resource to the list of resources to be written.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en matris med 8-bitars heltal utan tecken som en namngiven resurs i listan över resurser som ska skrivas.

trans-unit.source: The resources are not written until the <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Resurserna som skrivs inte förrän den <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A>metoden anropas.</xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Name of a resource.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på en resurs.

trans-unit.source: Value of a resource as an 8-bit unsigned integer array.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för en resurs som ett 8-bitars heltal utan tecken.

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The name parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Adds a named resource of type <xref:System.Object> to the list of resources to be written.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en namngiven resurs av typen <xref:System.Object>i listan över resurser som ska skrivas.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The resource is not written until the <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Resursen skrivs inte förrän den <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A>metoden anropas.</xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > `value` might have to be serializable, so you might have to provide a type converter, depending on which resource writer is used.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > `value` kanske måste kunna serialiseras, så du kan behöva ange en typkonverterare, beroende på vilken resurs som skrivaren används.

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på resursen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the resource.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för resursen.

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The name parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Adds a named resource of type <xref:System.String> to the list of resources to be written.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en namngiven resurs av typen <xref:System.String>i listan över resurser som ska skrivas.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The resource is not written until the <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Resursen skrivs inte förrän den <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A>metoden anropas.</xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på resursen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the resource.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för resursen.

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The name parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Closes the underlying resource file or stream, ensuring all the data has been written to the file.
trans-unit.target: Stänger den underliggande resursfilen eller stream, säkerställer att alla data har skrivits till filen.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, Close will call the <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A> method to output the resources to the underlying file or stream before closing it.
trans-unit.target: Om det behövs, anropar Stäng <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A>metoden till utdata resurser till den underliggande fil eller dataström innan du stänger det.</xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Generate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Writes all the resources added by the <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.AddResource*> method to the output file or stream.
trans-unit.target: Skriver alla resurser som lagts till av den <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.AddResource*>metod för att skapa fil eller dataström.</xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.AddResource*>

trans-unit.source: Generate does not close the output file or output stream.
trans-unit.target: Generera inte stänga utdatafilen eller utdataströmmen.

trans-unit.source: Instead, consider calling the <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: I stället anropas den <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Close%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: Generate is useful when you want to create a resource file, but you don't want to close the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Generera är användbart när du vill skapa en resursfil, men du inte vill stänga utdataströmmen.

trans-unit.source: Generate can be called only once.
trans-unit.target: Generera kan bara anropas en gång.

trans-unit.source: After you call Generate, all <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter> methods other than <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Close%2A> will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: När du anropar Generate, alla <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter>metoder än <xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Close%2A>genereras ett undantagsfel.</xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter.Close%2A> </xref:System.Resources.IResourceWriter>
